title: Hwy 17 between Wilmington and Hampstead is a mess.  Litter everywhere.  Same can be said for I-40 between Wilmington and RDU.  Has the DOT cut-back on road side litter pick-up?
text:
Here's a link to an upcoming clean up project:

http://www.ncdot.org/doh/operations/dp_chief_eng/roadside/Beautification/littersweep/default.html
